entry.def: A stand-alone business or organization is independent and does not receive financial support from another organization.

example.ex: They plan to relaunch it as a stand-alone company.
example.tran: 他们计划让它作为一个独立公司重新上市。

entry.def: A stand-alone computer is one that can operate on its own and does not have to be part of a network.

example.ex: ...an operating system that can work on networks and stand-alone machines.
example.tran: 能在网络和单机上运行的操作系统
